did he just write his personal opinions about various things?

Did R Yehuda HaNasi just write his perso.text: Let's remember that when R Yehuda HaNasi wrote the Mishnah, he was encoding the oral understandings of Torah that had existed long before him.

the fact that the Mishnah encodes the Oral Torah helps us think of a question on this Mishnah

What sorts of things are in the Oral Tor.text: Generally, we say that the Oral Torah contains the details of mitzvos we find in the written Torah.

Does this give us a question about our M.text: So, the Mishnah encodes the Oral Law which contains details of the things written in the written Torah.

where in the _written_ Torah do we find a source for the ability to use a _shaliach_?
